resources.string: Something went wrong and we are not at the moment able to process your request. We are working on the issue, thank you so much for your understanding!

In order to search, add and play songs from Spotify, we need you to login and grant access to your account. We would like to assure you that any of your personal data will not be shared. You can find more details about this in the privacy policy of Moin App.\n If you granted access yet it still did not work, please try again. We are very sorry about the inconvenience, please feel free to let us know about the problem in PlayStore. Thank you for your understanding!
